trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when reading, writing to, registering, or accessing in some other way an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 以其他某種方式讀取、寫入至、註冊或存取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error condition.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> class that provides a specific error condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定錯誤條件之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化物件所需要的資料。

trans-unit.source: The context, which includes source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 已序列化資料流的內容，包括來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> class that provides specific <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。
這個建構函式受到保護。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error that caused the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> class that provides a specific error condition and includes the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定錯誤條件且包含例外狀況原因之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not `null`, the current exception is thrown in a `catch` block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是`null`，擲回目前例外`catch`處理內部例外狀況區塊。
